solution_line_template: There are {jamie_last_name_letters} letters in Jamie’s last name, so Bobbie’s name is {jamie_last_name_letters}*{bobbie_twice} +{bobbie_minus} = <<{jamie_last_name_letters}*{bobbie_twice}+{bobbie_minus}={bobbie_last_name_letters}>>{bobbie_last_name_letters} letters long.

Samantha’s last name is {samantha_fewer} letters shorter than Bobbie’s, so there are {bobbie_last_name_letters} - {samantha_fewer} = <<{bobbie_last_name_letters}-{samantha_fewer}={samantha_last_name_letters}>>{samantha_last_name_letters} letters in Samantha’s last name.
